description: A simple recipe that is easy to prepare at home and really delicious.
name: Salted Caramel White Chocolate Pretzels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan on low to medium heat fill with water and place a stainless steel bowl on top.
Break up white chocolate and add to stainless steel bowl. Melt chocolate, add 1 Teaspoon salted caramel flavour and caramel spread. Mix until well combined.
Place a whole packet of salted pretzels into white chocolate mixture and using a fork, coat well.
Place on a cooling rack with a tray underneath to capture dripping from melted chocolate.
Repeat process until you get an even coat over the pretzels. You may need to repeat process 3 times until you get the desired thickness coating around the pretzels.
Allow the chocolate to dry on cooling rack.
Transfer to serving dish and serve. Enjoy!
